news.title: Academic who came under fire from Michael D Higgins considered for Fianna Fáil presidential run
news.summary: The leading academic who chaired the Government’s public consultation on defence and security, Louise Richardson, is among the names being considered as Fianna Fáil’s candidate for the presidential election.

news.title: An Post to keep sending parcels to US but Trump tariffs must be paid by recipient first
news.summary: Many parcels sent to the US will be returned to the sender by An Post unless new tariffs have been paid in advance.

news.title: Women referred by CervicalCheck among patients whose pre-cancerous cells were wrongly graded by consultant at Drogheda hospital
news.summary: Biopsy samples from a number of women who had been referred on for further investigation following screening through CervicalCheck were among those found to have an incorrect pre-cancerous grading at Our Lady of Lourdes Hospital in Drogheda, Co Louth.

news.title: Brian McEniff: Donegal’s Michael Murphy to return for All-Ireland tilt next year
news.summary: Donegal talisman Michael Murphy looks increasingly likely to sign up for another shot at Sam in 2026.

news.title: Ivana Bacik defends Catherine Connolly as presidential pick despite attack by former Labour leader Alan Kelly
news.summary: Labour leader Ivana Bacik says her party is proud to back Catherine Connolly for the presidency, despite senior TD Alan Kelly openly challenging the decision.

news.title: The Indo Daily: Garda clashes, alleged leaks and ‘civilian interference’ – Inside the CEA, Ireland’s ‘toxic’ corporate watchdog
news.summary: The Corporate Enforcement Authority, Ireland’s main watchdog for white-collar crime has been in turmoil over the past year.

news.title: Cian Healy on how he got hooked on knife-making: ‘I found I could just disappear into the work’
news.summary: Former Ireland rugby international Cian Healy has a passion for knife-making. Healy says it is a creative counterbalance to the pressures of professional sport.

news.title: Record number of children are homeless, as Barnardos report highlights devastating impact of accommodation failings
news.summary: The number of children in ­homelessness has reached record highs, with a new report revealing its effect on children.

news.title: Adrian Weckler: Google’s AI videos are so good you won’t believe your eyes – though you might be right not to
news.summary: Most of us are now familiar with online AI platforms such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Anthropic or even Grok. They’re becoming common for search queries, research, writing emails and lots of other things.

news.title: Isabelle Duff: What the reaction to Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s OTT engagement says about romance in 2025
news.summary: When the news broke that Taylor Swift – the most famous woman in the world – got engaged, my first thought was “finally”. A strange reaction given she has been dating Travis Kelce, star of NFL team the Kansas City Chiefs, for barely two years.
